repairedDockerfile:
FROM debian:testing
RUN echo fubar > /etc/machine-id

RUN apt-get update -qq && apt-get install -yq --no-install-recommends \
	gnutls-bin \
	gnutls-dev \
	gobject-introspection \
	gtk-doc-tools \
	libgirepository1.0-dev \
	libglib2.0-dev \
	libglib2.0-dev-bin \
	libgpgme11-dev \
	libjson-glib-dev \
	meson \
	ninja-build \
	pkg-config \
	valac && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

WORKDIR /build
